CB1.name: CB1
CB1.question: Is this a new treatment start for the patient?
CB1.context: Initial checkbox in treatment timeline section indicating whether patient is beginning new therapy versus continuing existing treatment.

T2.name: T2
T2.question: What is the month of treatment start?
T2.context: 2-digit month format for planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

T3.name: T3
T3.question: What is the day of treatment start?
T3.context: 2-digit day format for planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

T4.name: T4
T4.question: What is the year of treatment start?
T4.context: 4-digit year format for planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

CB5.name: CB5
CB5.question: Is this a continuation of an existing therapy for the patient?
CB5.context: Indicates if the request is for ongoing treatment, requiring details of the last administration date.

T6.name: T6
T6.question: What is the month of the last treatment?
T6.context: 2-digit month for the most recent administration of the medication being continued.

T7.name: T7
T7.question: What is the day of the last treatment?
T7.context: 2-digit day for the most recent administration of the medication being continued.

T8.name: T8
T8.question: What is the year of the last treatment?
T8.context: 4-digit year for the most recent administration of the medication being continued.

T9.name: T9
T9.question: Who is requesting this precertification?
T9.context: Name of the individual submitting the precertification request on behalf of the patient/provider.

T10.name: T10
T10.question: What is the phone number of the precertification requestor?
T10.context: Contact phone number for the person designated as the precertification requestor.

T11.name: T11
T11.question: What is the fax number of the precertification requestor?
T11.context: Contact fax number for the person designated as the precertification requestor.

T12.name: T12
T12.question: What is the patient's first name?
T12.context: Patient demographic information for identification purposes in the patient information section.

T13.name: T13
T13.question: What is the patient's last name?
T13.context: Patient demographic information for identification purposes in the patient information section.

T14.name: T14
T14.question: What is the patient's date of birth?
T14.context: Patient demographic information to verify identity and age in the patient information section.

T15.name: T15
T15.question: What is the patient's street address?
T15.context: Patient's primary residential address for demographic and communication purposes.

T16.name: T16
T16.question: What is the patient's city?
T16.context: Patient's residential city, part of demographic and contact information.

T17.name: T17
T17.question: What is the patient's state?
T17.context: Patient's residential state, part of demographic and contact information.

T18.name: T18
T18.question: What is the patient's ZIP code?
T18.context: Patient's residential ZIP code, part of demographic and contact information.

T19.name: T19
T19.question: What is the patient's phone number?
T19.context: Patient contact information for communication in the patient information section.

T20.name: T20
T20.question: What is the patient's work phone number?
T20.context: Secondary contact number for the patient, used for business hours contact.

T21.name: T21
T21.question: What is the patient's cell phone number?
T21.context: Mobile contact number for the patient, typically for direct and urgent communications.

T22.name: T22
T22.question: What is the patient's email address?
T22.context: Electronic contact information for the patient, for digital correspondence.

T24.name: T24
T24.question: What is the patient's current weight in pounds?
T24.context: Patient's current weight in pounds, critical for accurate medication dosing calculations.

T25.name: T25
T25.question: What is the patient's current weight in kilograms?
T25.context: Patient's current weight in kilograms, critical for accurate medication dosing calculations.

T26.name: T26
T26.question: What is the patient's current height in inches?
T26.context: Patient's current height in inches, used for body surface area calculations for dosing.

T27.name: T27
T27.question: What is the patient's current height in centimeters?
T27.context: Patient's current height in centimeters, used for body surface area calculations for dosing.

T23.name: T23
T23.question: What known allergies does the patient have?
T23.context: Crucial safety information regarding patient's allergies to ensure medication safety.

T28.name: T28
T28.question: What is the patient's insurance member ID number?
T28.context: Primary identifier for the patient under their insurance policy for eligibility verification.

T29.name: T29
T29.question: What is the patient's insurance group number?
T29.context: Identifies the specific insurance group or plan under which the patient is covered.

T30.name: T30
T30.question: Who is the primary insured party for this policy?
T30.context: Name of the primary policyholder, especially if different from the patient.

CB31.name: CB31
CB31.question: Does the patient have other health coverage?
CB31.context: Determines if secondary insurance information is required for coordination of benefits.

CB32.name: CB32
CB32.question: Does the patient have no other health coverage?
CB32.context: Indicates the absence of secondary insurance coverage for the patient.

T33.name: T33
T33.question: If other coverage exists, what is the ID number?
T33.context: Member ID for the patient's secondary insurance policy, if applicable.

T34.name: T34
T34.question: What is the name of the other insurance carrier?
T34.context: Name of the secondary insurance company, if the patient has additional coverage.

T35.name: T35
T35.question: Who is the primary insured party for the other policy?
T35.context: Name of the primary policyholder for the patient's secondary insurance, if applicable.

T42.name: T42
T42.question: What is the prescriber's first name?
T42.context: Prescriber's first name for proper identification and record-keeping.

T43.name: T43
T43.question: What is the prescriber's last name?
T43.context: Prescriber's last name for proper identification and record-keeping.

CB44.name: CB44
CB44.question: Is the prescriber an M.D. (Medical Doctor)?
CB44.context: Indicates the professional designation of the prescribing physician.

CB45.name: CB45
CB45.question: Is the prescriber a D.O. (Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine)?
CB45.context: Indicates the professional designation of the prescribing physician.

CB46.name: CB46
CB46.question: Is the prescriber an N.P. (Nurse Practitioner)?
CB46.context: Indicates the professional designation of the prescribing advanced practice nurse.

CB47.name: CB47
CB47.question: Is the prescriber a P.A. (Physician Assistant)?
CB47.context: Indicates the professional designation of the prescribing physician assistant.

T48.name: T48
T48.question: What is the prescriber's street address?
T48.context: Prescriber's primary office address for contact and verification.

T49.name: T49
T49.question: What is the prescriber's city?
T49.context: Prescriber's office city for contact and verification.

T50.name: T50
T50.question: What is the prescriber's state?
T50.context: Prescriber's office state for contact and verification.

T51.name: T51
T51.question: What is the prescriber's ZIP code?
T51.context: Prescriber's office ZIP code for contact and verification.

T52.name: T52
T52.question: What is the prescriber's phone number?
T52.context: Prescriber's office phone number for direct contact.

T53.name: T53
T53.question: What is the prescriber's fax number?
T53.context: Prescriber's office fax number for sending documents.

T54.name: T54
T54.question: What is the prescriber's state license number?
T54.context: Prescriber's professional license identifier, mandatory for verification.

T55.name: T55
T55.question: What is the prescriber's NPI (National Provider Identifier) number?
T55.context: Unique identification number for healthcare providers required for billing.

T56.name: T56
T56.question: What is the prescriber's DEA (Drug Enforcement Administration) number?
T56.context: Registration number for prescribers authorized to prescribe controlled substances.

T57.name: T57
T57.question: What is the prescriber's UPIN (Unique Physician Identification Number)?
T57.context: Legacy identifier for physicians previously used by Medicare, may still be requested.

T58.0.name: T58.0
T58.0.question: What is the prescriber's email address?
T58.0.context: Electronic contact information for the prescriber for communication.

T58.1.name: T58.1
T58.1.question: What is the office contact person's name?
T58.1.context: Name of an alternative contact person within the prescriber's office.

T59.name: T59
T59.question: What is the office contact person's phone number?
T59.context: Phone number for the alternative office contact person.

Provider Admin CB.1.name: Provider Admin CB.1
Provider Admin CB.1.question: Will the medication be self-administered?
Provider Admin CB.1.context: Indicates if the patient will administer the medication themselves, impacting dispensing method.

Provider Admin CB.2.name: Provider Admin CB.2
Provider Admin CB.2.question: Will the medication be administered in a physician’s office?
Provider Admin CB.2.context: Indicates the specific healthcare setting for medication administration.

Provider Admin CB.3.name: Provider Admin CB.3
Provider Admin CB.3.question: Will the medication be administered at home?
Provider Admin CB.3.context: Indicates the specific healthcare setting for medication administration.

Provider Admin CB.4.name: Provider Admin CB.4
Provider Admin CB.4.question: Will the medication be administered at an outpatient infusion center?
Provider Admin CB.4.context: Indicates the specific healthcare setting for medication administration.

Provider Admin T.5.name: Provider Admin T.5
Provider Admin T.5.question: What is the name of the outpatient infusion center?
Provider Admin T.5.context: Required if Outpatient Infusion Center is selected, specifies the facility name.

Provider Admin CB.7.name: Provider Admin CB.7
Provider Admin CB.7.question: Will the medication be administered by a home infusion center?
Provider Admin CB.7.context: Indicates if a specialized home infusion service will provide and administer the drug.

Provider Admin T.6.name: Provider Admin T.6
Provider Admin T.6.question: What is the phone number for the home infusion center?
Provider Admin T.6.context: Contact number for the home infusion center providing medication and administration services.

Provider Admin T.8.name: Provider Admin T.8
Provider Admin T.8.question: What is the name of the home infusion agency?
Provider Admin T.8.context: Name of the agency providing home infusion services for medication administration.

Provider Admin CB.10.name: Provider Admin CB.10
Provider Admin CB.10.question: Are administration codes being provided?
Provider Admin CB.10.context: Indicates whether CPT codes for medication administration services will be listed.

Provider Admin T.9.name: Provider Admin T.9
Provider Admin T.9.question: What are the CPT administration codes?
Provider Admin T.9.context: Specific CPT codes used for billing medication administration services, if applicable.

Provider Admin T.11A.name: Provider Admin T.11A
Provider Admin T.11A.question: What is the administration address?
Provider Admin T.11A.context: Street address of the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.13.name: Provider Admin T.13
Provider Admin T.13.question: What is the city of administration?
Provider Admin T.13.context: City of the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.14.name: Provider Admin T.14
Provider Admin T.14.question: What is the state of administration?
Provider Admin T.14.context: State of the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.15.name: Provider Admin T.15
Provider Admin T.15.question: What is the ZIP code of administration?
Provider Admin T.15.context: ZIP code of the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.16.name: Provider Admin T.16
Provider Admin T.16.question: What is the phone number of the administration site?
Provider Admin T.16.context: Contact phone number for the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.17A.name: Provider Admin T.17A
Provider Admin T.17A.question: What is the fax number of the administration site?
Provider Admin T.17A.context: Contact fax number for the location where the medication will be administered.

Provider Admin T.18.name: Provider Admin T.18
Provider Admin T.18.question: What is the Tax Identification Number (TIN) of the administration site?
Provider Admin T.18.context: Taxpayer identification for the entity administering the medication, used for billing.

Provider Admin T.19.name: Provider Admin T.19
Provider Admin T.19.question: What is the Provider Identification Number (PIN) of the administration site?
Provider Admin T.19.context: Specific provider identifier for the entity administering the medication.

Provider Admin T.20.name: Provider Admin T.20
Provider Admin T.20.question: What is the NPI (National Provider Identifier) of the administration site?
Provider Admin T.20.context: Unique national identifier for the healthcare provider administering the medication.

Provider Admin CB.21.name: Provider Admin CB.21
Provider Admin CB.21.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at an Outpatient Dialysis Center?
Provider Admin CB.21.context: Indicates the specific healthcare setting for medication dispensing or administration.

Provider Admin CB.22.name: Provider Admin CB.22
Provider Admin CB.22.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at a Physician’s Office?
Provider Admin CB.22.context: Indicates the specific healthcare setting for medication dispensing or administration.

Provider Admin CB.23.0.0.name: Provider Admin CB.23.0.0
Provider Admin CB.23.0.0.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at a Retail Pharmacy?
Provider Admin CB.23.0.0.context: Indicates the specific dispensing location for the medication.

Provider Admin CB.24.0.0.name: Provider Admin CB.24.0.0
Provider Admin CB.24.0.0.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at a Specialty Pharmacy?
Provider Admin CB.24.0.0.context: Indicates the specific dispensing location for complex or high-cost medications.

Provider Admin CB.25.name: Provider Admin CB.25
Provider Admin CB.25.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered via Mail Order?
Provider Admin CB.25.context: Indicates the method of medication dispensing, typically for maintenance drugs.

Provider Admin CB.26.name: Provider Admin CB.26
Provider Admin CB.26.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at an 'Other' location?
Provider Admin CB.26.context: Allows for specification of a dispensing/administration location not listed above.

Provider Admin T.27.question: Please specify the 'Other' dispensing/administration location.
Provider Admin T.27.context: Detailed explanation required if the 'Other' dispensing/administration option is selected.

Provider Admin T.28.name: Provider Admin T.28
Provider Admin T.28.question: What is the name of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.28.context: Name of the entity responsible for dispensing the requested medication.

Provider Admin T.29a.name: Provider Admin T.29a
Provider Admin T.29a.question: What is the address of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.29a.context: Street address of the entity responsible for dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.30a.name: Provider Admin T.30a
Provider Admin T.30a.question: What is the city of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.30a.context: City of the entity responsible for dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.31.name: Provider Admin T.31
Provider Admin T.31.question: What is the state of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.31.context: State of the entity responsible for dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.32.name: Provider Admin T.32
Provider Admin T.32.question: What is the ZIP code of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.32.context: ZIP code of the entity responsible for dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.33.name: Provider Admin T.33
Provider Admin T.33.question: What is the phone number of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.33.context: Contact phone number for the entity dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.34.name: Provider Admin T.34
Provider Admin T.34.question: What is the fax number of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.34.context: Contact fax number for the entity dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.35.name: Provider Admin T.35
Provider Admin T.35.question: What is the Tax Identification Number (TIN) of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.35.context: Taxpayer identification for the entity dispensing the medication, used for billing.

Provider Admin T.36.name: Provider Admin T.36
Provider Admin T.36.question: What is the Provider Identification Number (PIN) of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.36.context: Specific provider identifier for the entity dispensing the medication.

Provider Admin T.37.name: Provider Admin T.37

Provider Admin T.37.context: Unique national identifier for the healthcare provider dispensing the medication.

CB60.name: CB60
CB60.question: Is Riabni (rituximab-arrx) the requested product?
CB60.context: Selection of the specific rituximab biosimilar product requested for prior authorization.

CB61.name: CB61
CB61.question: Is Rituxan (rituximab) the requested product?
CB61.context: Selection of the original rituximab product requested for prior authorization.

CB62.name: CB62
CB62.question: Is Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr) the requested product?
CB62.context: Selection of a specific rituximab biosimilar product requested for prior authorization.

CB63.name: CB63
CB63.question: Is Truxima (rituximab-abbs) the requested product?
CB63.context: Selection of a specific rituximab biosimilar product requested for prior authorization.

T64.name: T64
T64.question: What is the prescribed dose of the requested medication?
T64.context: Details of the medication dosage, crucial for treatment plan review and approval.

T65.name: T65
T65.question: What are the directions for using the medication?
T65.context: Instructions for medication administration, including frequency and route.

T66.name: T66
T66.question: What is the HCPCS code for the requested product/service?
T66.context: Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code for billing the specific medication or service.

T67.name: T67
T67.question: What is the primary ICD code for the patient's diagnosis?
T67.context: Primary International Classification of Diseases code supporting the medical necessity of the request.

CB68.name: CB68
CB68.question: Are there any other relevant ICD codes?
CB68.context: Indicates if additional International Classification of Diseases codes are applicable to the patient's diagnosis.

T69.name: T69
T69.question: What are the other applicable ICD codes?
T69.context: Additional International Classification of Diseases codes providing further diagnostic context.

CB70.name: CB70
CB70.question: Has the patient had prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB70.context: Determines if the patient has previously used the requested drug within a year, impacting approval.

CB71.name: CB71
CB71.question: Has the patient not had prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB71.context: Indicates no prior use of the requested drug within a year, relevant for initial approval criteria.

CB72.name: CB72
CB72.question: Has the patient NOT had a trial and failure of any rituximab biosimilars?
CB72.context: Indicates whether the patient has attempted and failed preferred biosimilar treatments.

CB73.name: CB73
CB73.question: Was Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr) tried and failed?
CB73.context: Specific inquiry about the trial and failure of the preferred biosimilar Ruxience.

CB74.name: CB74
CB74.question: Was Truxima (rituximab-abbs) tried and failed?
CB74.context: Specific inquiry about the trial and failure of the preferred biosimilar Truxima.

T75.name: T75
T75.field_label: When was the member’s trial and failure of the preferred drug?
T75.question: When did the patient's trial and failure of the preferred drug occur?
T75.context: Date of the clinical trial and documented failure of the previously preferred medication.

T76.name: T76
T76.field_label: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug
T76.question: Please describe how the preferred drug failed.
T76.context: Detailed explanation of why the patient's prior therapy with the preferred drug was unsuccessful.

CB77.name: CB77
CB77.question: Has the patient NOT had an adverse reaction to any rituximab biosimilars?
CB77.context: Indicates whether the patient has experienced adverse reactions to preferred biosimilar treatments.

CB78.name: CB78
CB78.question: Did the patient have an adverse reaction to Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr)?
CB78.context: Specific inquiry about adverse reaction to the preferred biosimilar Ruxience.

CB79.name: CB79
CB79.question: Did the patient have an adverse reaction to Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?
CB79.context: Specific inquiry about adverse reaction to the preferred biosimilar Truxima.

T80.name: T80
T80.field_label: When was the member’s adverse reaction to the preferred drug?
T80.question: When did the patient's adverse reaction to the preferred drug occur?
T80.context: Date of the patient's documented adverse reaction to the previously preferred medication.

T81.name: T81
T81.field_label: Please describe the nature of the adverse reaction to the preferred drug
T81.question: Please describe the nature of the patient's adverse reaction to the preferred drug.
T81.context: Detailed explanation of the type and severity of the adverse reaction experienced by the patient.

T84.name: T84
T84.field_label: Please explain if there are any contraindications or other medical reason(s) that the patient cannot use any of the following preferred biosimilar products when indicated for the patient’s diagnosis?
T84.question: Are there any contraindications or medical reasons preventing the patient from using preferred rituximab biosimilars?
T84.context: Requires detailed justification if preferred biosimilars are not being used due to medical reasons.

CB82.name: CB82
CB82.question: Is Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr) contraindicated for the patient?
CB82.context: Indicates if Ruxience, a preferred biosimilar, is medically unsuitable due to contraindications.

CB83.name: CB83
CB83.question: Is Truxima (rituximab-abbs) contraindicated for the patient?
CB83.context: Indicates if Truxima, a preferred biosimilar, is medically unsuitable due to contraindications.

CB86.name: CB86
CB86.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Inflectra (infliximab-dyyb)?
CB86.context: Clinical information for initiation, indicating prior therapy with a non-preferred infliximab biosimilar. Part of a sub-question.

CB87.name: CB87
CB87.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Renflexis (infliximab-abda)?

CB88.context: Clinical information for initiation, indicating prior therapy with a non-preferred golimumab biosimilar. Part of a sub-question.

T89.context: Date of patient's prior therapy failure for a specific preferred drug, required for clinical justification.

T90.name: T90
T90.field_label: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug

T90.context: Detailed explanation of why the patient's prior therapy with the preferred drug was unsuccessful.

CB85.name: CB85
CB85.question: Has the patient NOT had a trial and failure of any of the listed infliximab or golimumab biosimilars?
CB85.context: Indicates if the patient has not failed any specified non-preferred biosimilars (Inflectra, Renflexis, Simponi Aria).

CB92.name: CB92
CB92.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Inflectra (infliximab-dyyb)?
CB92.context: Clinical information for initiation, indicating an adverse reaction to a non-preferred infliximab biosimilar. Part of a sub-question.

CB93.name: CB93
CB93.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Renflexis (infliximab-abda)?

CB94.name: CB94
CB94.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Simponi Aria (golimumab)?
CB94.context: Clinical information for initiation, indicating an adverse reaction to a non-preferred golimumab biosimilar. Part of a sub-question.

T96a.name: T96a

CB91.name: CB91
CB91.question: Has the patient NOT had an adverse reaction to any of the listed infliximab or golimumab biosimilars?
